comment.author: 29802266@N07
comment._content: Interesting photo, but judging from the appearance of those three men I would say the date is off by nearly a half-century.  The chap on the right appears to be holding a fairly compact camera and the sunglasses certainly don't say '1900'.  Maybe late 1940s, early 1950s?

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: Yes the collection is chiefly 1800-1912 but there are also later photographs
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection
